flawed_nl_solution:
The normal price of the lessons would be 20*40=$<<20*40=800>>800
The discount saves him 800*0.25=$<<800*0.25=200>>200
So the lessons cost him 800-200=$<<800-200=6000>>6000
That means everything costs 500+6000=$<<500+6000=6500>>6500

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 600.0, not 6000.0. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
